name: Keeping Things Green
description: Keeping Things Green is a score-based game where you play as a frog trying to build a garden for his family! The game is focused on completing tasks each day, such as cleaning up trash, building things for the garden, decorating, etc. We focused our design on simple and cute animals, and the game is intended to be both relaxing and able to be played over and over to improve the final score. Help Froggy complete the garden so that he can raise his child and his family can be happy and healthy!
